item.title: HTTP basics
item.description: WHH - Chapter 3 - Web App Technologies this will be primer of many of the underlying technologies that power the web and associated technologies. The HTTP Protocol BLUF: Message based model where the client sends a request and the server retruns a response. HTTP uses a stateful protocl - TCP - but is stateless, where each request is autonomous and may use a different TCP connection. HTTP Requests The first line of every HTTP request has three (3) items, separated by spaces:
